subHeading: Classic Jeopardy but with your friends
question: Question
errorCreateIdMessage: Error: Jeopardy ID must not be empty
errorPlayIdMessage: Error: Jeopardy ID must not be empty
errorCreateQuestionMessage: Error: There has to be at least one question in each category
errorCreateCategoryMessage: Error: There has to be at least one category
createInfo: Click on each $ box to create a new question
Click on YES or NO to mark the right answer
Press Complete and return to Jeopardy Board to lock in the answer
The completed questions will be marked with a lighter colour
Continue to fill in the rest of the questions
Great job, you have created your own Jeopardy!
